doc.after: Spanish music is often considered abroad to be synonymous with flamenco a West Andalusian musical genre which contrary to popular belief is not widespread outside that region Various regional styles of folk music abound in Aragon Catalonia Valencia Castile the Basque Country Galicia and Asturias Pop rock hip hop and heavy metal are also popular
